requirements.summary: Configure Pinterest Tag to automatically track page views on site load
acceptanceCriteria: pintrk('page') is called after Pinterest Tag initialization
Page view events are sent to Pinterest analytics dashboard

file_operations.description: Add pintrk('page') call immediately after the pintrk('load', '2614024734220', {em: '<user_email_address>'}) initialization within the Pinterest Tag script block in the <head> section.
